Home » 39P6 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6) » 1 Hetuduka, Duka
1.15 Hetuduka, āsavasampayuttaduka
Hetuduka, Duka
Hetuduka, āsavasampayuttaduka
36.
107Hetuṃ āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
108Hetuyā nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
37.
109Hetuṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
110Hetuyā nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
